summary: The underachieving son of a marriage bureau owner attempts to marry a don's daughter to a supposed police officer in an effort to prove his worth to his father.
cast: Akshay Kumar|Asin Thottumkal|Himesh Reshammiya|Mithun Chakraborty|Raj Babbar|Mukesh Rishi|Rahul Singh|Rajesh Khattar|Bharti Singh|Manoj Joshi|Paresh Rawal|Sanjay Mishra|Johnny Lever|Dinesh Lamba|Claudia Ciesla|Mukesh Tiwari|Naushaad Abbas|Vipin Bakshi|Swantatra Bharat|Sorabh Chauhan|Suneel Dutt|Pradeep Kabra|Mushtaq Khan|Cyndy Khojol|Shelley Marshall|Sanjai Mishra
keywords: marriage bureau|long lost brother|suitor|car crash|impersonating a police officer
title: Khiladi 786
